label: XENON10, Ionization only search - corrected
comment: XENON10, July 2011, 90%CL Assuming Vo=230km/s, SI nucleons. Quoting the paper-"So as not to overstate the energy resolution, we adopt a parameterization which follows the Poisson component only, given by R(E_nr) = (2E_nr)^-0.5 . We assume a sharp cutoff;
